name: Word Winder
description:
The iPhone Mom says:
"Only the most addictive, challenging and entertaining word game app that I have ever played."

The App Review Zone says:
"The Word Winder word search game is one of those games that just keeps giving more and more and more!"

AppCraver.com says:
"This is a must see app simply for its brilliant combination of word play, trivia and word building strategy."

And extra special, this month only: Word Winder delivers a dozen Mother's Day Puzzles -- just for you and totally in honor of our Moms. The dozen special puzzles are finely crafted by America’s most syndicated puzzle maker, David L. Hoyt (Daily Jumble™, Word Roundup™, & many others). David makes all of the puzzles in Word Winder -- an app which contains six amazing and totally original games!

Play by yourself and choose one of four different puzzle games – every puzzle is hand crafted by David L. Hoyt. Or play together with friends and family (pass-and-play) in your choice of multi-player modes. The multi-player game is essentially the hit Word Winder board game launched in 2012!

Features of Word Winder include:
* 12 Free Mother's Day Puzzles -- play them this month
* 20 Additional Free Puzzles to get you started (5 each of 4 types)
* 31 Days of Unlimited Play of pass-and-play Multi-player
* Uses the Merriam-Webster Dictionary for determining answer validity!
* Super sharp retina design
* Game Center High Scores and Achievements
* Progress in all games/puzzles automatically saved
* 500+ additional puzzles available in collections (in-app purchases)

Word Winder is the game of winding words from the Man Who Puzzles America (David L. Hoyt) -- the game which has created amazing buzz all around the world since its 2012 launch! Try Word Winder today.
